formal_name:
ACE COMBAT™ ASSAULT
HORIZON LEGACY + - Update
description:
This patch enables compatibility with
the Nintendo 3DS™ NFC reader/writer.
Now with any Nintendo 3DS™ model,
you will be able to unlock exclusive
aircrafts inspired by corresponding
amiibo™ figurine.
name:
ACE COMBAT™ ASSAULT
HORIZON LEGACY + - Update
